description: Rod Barry, our creepy janitor, spends hours working on a gift for his crush, the football player Dak Ramsey, only to discover that the unappreciative Dak has tossed his gift in the trash. Rod's head nearly explodes with rage, and he decides to teach Dak a lesson. Rod ties Dak up in the gym and smacks him hard with a crop. Dak, defiant, refuses to give in, so Rod ties him up to the punching bag. He whips Dak into submission then he takes photos of their sexual acts, which he intends to use as blackmail.
title: The Creepy Janitor and The Football Player
